StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: DELETESENIORLECTURER
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.DELETESENIORLECTURER(pIDPerson IN NUMBER) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN&lt;br/&gt; DELETE FROM SeniorLecturer_table &lt;br/&gt; WHERE idPerson = pIDPerson;&lt;br/&gt; COMMIT;&lt;br/&gt;END deleteSeniorLecturer;
